availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Peartree Smith (Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Father of Susan B. Smith. Married to Hebe C. Preston in Henderson County, Kentucky on October 31, 1852. Resident of Henderson County, Kentucky in 1840. Owned one enslaved person in Henderson in 1840. U.S. Marshall in Henderson County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Henderson County, Kentucky in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson, District 1, p. 309A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson, Division 2, p. 184.
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson, p. 229.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film #001944390 p.139.
Find A Grave, "William Peartree Smith (1809-1861)," Memorial #84745262, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/84745262 (accessed January 20, 2020).
